Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hilton Sharjah, you'll be centrally located in Sharjah, convenient to Al Qasba and Sahara Centre. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Al Noor Mosque and Sharjah City Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. LCD televisions with cable programming are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 3 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a steam room. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and gift shops/newsstands. Guests can catch a ride to the beach or shopping on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. This hotel has 7 meeting rooms available for events. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2:00 PM Check-out time is 12:00 PM
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Dip into one of the 3 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a steam room. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and gift shops/newsstands. Guests can catch a ride to the beach or shopping on the complimentary shuttle.
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes. LCD televisions with cable programming are provided for your entertainment, with wired and wireless Internet access available for a surcharge. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at Hilton Sharjah, you'll be centrally located in Sharjah, convenient to Al Qasba and Sahara Centre. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Al Noor Mosque and Sharjah City Centre.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Al Qasba - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Al Noor Mosque - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Sharjah City Centre - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Sharjah Corniche Hospital - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Al Jazeera Park - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Sharjah Aquarium - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Sharjah Gold Souq - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Blue Souq Sharjah - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
King Faisal Mosque - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Al Mahatta Museum - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Sharjah Mega Mall - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Sharjah Gold Center - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Al Mamzar Beach Park - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Sharjah Heritage Museum - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Sahara Centre - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Dubai (DXB-Dubai Intl.) - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi
Sharjah (SHJ-Sharjah Intl.) - 14.3 km / 8.9 mi
Dubai (XNB-Dubai Bus Station) - 16.6 km / 10.3 mi

The preferred airport for Hilton Sharjah is Sharjah (SHJ-Sharjah Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
